edu.umn.nlpnewt

Class ProcessorServerOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umn.nlpnewt.ProcessorServerOptions

  • public class ProcessorServerOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Options bean used to start a processor server.

    Which processor to launch is specified via either processor or processorClass.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ProcessorServerOptions.ProcessorOptionHandler
      An args4j option handler that will parse a fully qualified class name into a EventProcessor class.

      • getUniqueServiceId

        public java.lang.String getUniqueServiceId()
        Gets a unique, per-instance service identifier used to register and deregister the processor with service discovery. Note: This identifier is not used to discover the service like getIdentifier(), only to enable de-registration of this specific service instance.
        Returns:
        String identifier or a random UUID if not set.

      • setUniqueServiceId

        public void setUniqueServiceId(java.lang.String uniqueServiceId)
        Sets a unique, per-instance service identifier used to register and deregister the processor with service discovery. Note: This identifier is not used to discover the service like getIdentifier(), only to enable de-registration of this specific service instance.
        Parameters:
        uniqueServiceId - A string identifier unique to this service instance.
